problems.title: Matrix Multiplication
problems.description: Multiply two matrices and print the result.
problems.inputFormat:
First line: r1 c1 (first matrix dimensions)
Next r1 lines: c1 integers each
Next line: r2 c2 (second matrix dimensions)
Next r2 lines: c2 integers each
problems.constraints:
1 ≤ r1, c1, r2, c2 ≤ 5
c1 must equal r2

problems.title: Spiral Print
problems.description: Print matrix elements in spiral order (clockwise).
problems.inputFormat:
First line: rows and columns (r c)
Next r lines: c space-separated integers each
problems.outputFormat: Print elements in spiral order, space-separated
